hero.title: Zerobrew is a drop-in replacement for Homebrew, achieving 20x/5x the speed with the same packages.

installs.installParagraph: Install zerobrew in seconds and keep your existing Homebrew formulas. No rewrites, just faster installs.

whyCards.title: Content-addressable store
whyCards.body: Packages are stored by hash, so re-installs are instant and deduplicated.

whyCards.title: Parallel pipeline
whyCards.body: Downloads, extraction, and linking run concurrently for dramatic speedups.

whyCards.title: Homebrew compatible
whyCards.body: Use the same formula names and swap brew for zb.
